  • Method Details

    • setGUI

      public void setGUI(GUIRoot gui)
      Sets the GUI root reference for this face-up scene controller. This method establishes the connection between the controller and the main GUI application, enabling the controller to communicate with other GUI components and handle user interactions.
      Overrides:
      setGUI in class ViewController
      Parameters:
      gui - the GUIRoot instance that manages the overall GUI application

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the face-up scene controller after the FXML file has been loaded. This method sets up the background image, creates a 10x16 grid of interactive cells for displaying tiles, and configures mouse event handlers for tile selection and hover effects. Each cell is bound to the grid's dimensions for responsive scaling and includes visual feedback for user interactions.
      Parameters:
      url - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if unknown
      resourceBundle - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if not localized

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the face-up scene and returns to the previous view. This method is triggered when the user wants to exit the face-up tiles selection screen and notifies the GUI root to handle the scene transition.

    • handleChoice

      public void handleChoice(int row, int col)
      Handles the selection of a face-up tile at the specified grid position. This method converts the row and column coordinates to a linear index and validates that the selection is within the bounds of available tiles before notifying the GUI root of the user's choice.
      Parameters:
      row - the row position in the grid (0-based)
      col - the column position in the grid (0-based)

    • update

      public void update(Game game)
      Updates the face-up tiles display with the current game state. This method retrieves the list of available face-up tiles from the game, clears all existing tile images, and loads new tile images based on their IDs. The method handles image loading errors gracefully and updates the internal size counter to track the number of available tiles.
      Overrides:
      update in class ViewController
      Parameters:
      game - the Game object containing the current state of face-up tiles

    • goToFaceUpScene

      public void goToFaceUpScene(GUIRoot gui)
      Placeholder method for navigation to the face-up scene. Currently returns immediately without performing any action. This method appears to be intended for scene transition logic but is not implemented.
      Overrides:
      goToFaceUpScene in class ViewController
      Parameters:
      gui - the GUIRoot instance for potential scene management operations
